title: Monday Night Football Extravaganza with Kevin Harlan, Eric Dickerson, The Chainsmokers and More!
itunes:title: Monday Night Football Extravaganza with Kevin Harlan, Eric Dickerson, The Chainsmokers and More!
description:
Dave Dameshek leaves the cozy confines of Studio 66 to kibbitz with celebrities, NFL analysts and athletes ahead of MNF at the LA Coliseum! Westwood One’s Kevin Harland and Kurt Warner kickoff the round of VIPs joining Dave to discuss keys of the game between KC and the Rams (:40). After, Shek welcomes Kansas’s very own musical artist, Melissa Etheridge (11:00), and Rams legend Eric Dickerson (14:40) to expound upon their fandom for their respective teams! Oh! The melodic stylings of The Chainsmokers make their way onto DDFP (22:10) before WWE Hall of Famer Ric Flair ‘WOOO[s]’ Dave (25:25). Next, ex-Chief Dante Hall gives his take on MNF right before kickoff (27:50). As both teams break for halftime, Rams radio analyst and close friend of the show, MJD, gives his first half takeaways with Rams play-by-play announcer J.B. Long (31:00)! Postgame, Rams linebacker Samson Ebukam reveals how many TDs he’s scored in his career (39:00) and to cap off the show, Chiefs loyalist Ryan Bartlett shares why he’s optimistic in KC’s future (41:40). 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
